What Can We Do With <table> tag
answer_1: It is used with <colgroup> element to specify column properties for each column.
answer_2: It is used to group the header content in a table.
answer_3: It defines a cell in a table.

title: What Can We Do With <tfooter> tag
answer_1: It is used to group the footer content in a table.
answer_2: It specifies a group of one or more columns in a table for formatting.
answer_3: It is used to group the body content in a table..
right_answer: It is used to group the footer content in a table.

title: What Can We Do With <colgroup> tag
answer_1: It defines a row in a table.
answer_2: It defines a cell in a table.
answer_3: It specifies a group of one or more columns in a table for formatting.
answer_4: It is used to group the header content in a table.
right_answer: It specifies a group of one or more columns in a table for formatting.

title: What Can We Do With <tr> tag
answer_1: It defines a row in a table.
answer_2: It defines a cell in a table.
answer_3: It defines a header cell in a table.
right_answer: It defines a row in a table.

title: What Can We Do With <td> tag
answer_1: It defines a row in a table.
answer_2: It defines a cell in a table.
answer_3: It defines a header cell in a table.
right_answer: It defines a cell in a table.

title: What is the use of the required attribute in HTML5?
